definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]

sentences.english: Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B were common types of hepatitis in Putuo district .
sentences.chinese: 甲型和乙型病毒性肝炎是普陀区常见的肝炎类型。

sentences.english: Aim To observe the therapeutic efficacy of Matrine on viral keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苦参碱对病毒性角膜炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: How does cheeper prevent summer virus sex encephalitis?
sentences.chinese: 夏天幼儿怎样预防病毒性脑炎？

sentences.english: The Diagnostic Methods of Mink Viral Enteritis is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对水貂病毒性肠炎诊断方法进行了阐述。

sentences.english: Viral myocarditis is a common disease, especially in the winter and spring seasons and more.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性心肌炎是一种常见病，尤以冬春季节多发。

sentences.english: Here is the microscopic appearance of a viral pneumonia with interstitial lymphocytic infiltrates.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性肺炎间质淋巴细胞浸润。

sentences.english: Conclusion Yanhuning injection is effective in the adjuvant treatment of viral pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 结论注射用炎琥宁能够有效佐治小儿病毒性肺炎。

sentences.english: Viral conjunctivitis can spread to the cornea, the white of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性结膜炎可以蔓延到角膜，白色的眼睛。

sentences.english: More needs to be done to prevent and control viral hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 预防和控制病毒性肝炎需要开展更多的工作。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of electroencephalograph in diagnosis of viral encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑电图在病毒性脑炎诊断中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of thymosin on pediatric viral myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸腺肽治疗小儿病毒性心肌炎的疗效。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical value of gall bladder wall change of virus hepatitis tested by B-ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 评价B超检查胆囊壁改变在病毒性肝炎中的临床价值。

sentences.english: CMV retinitis is common in developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 巨细胞病毒性视网膜炎在发展中国家很常见。

sentences.english: With viral bronchitis, small amounts of white mucus are often coughed up.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性急性支气管炎，通常咳出少量白色粘液痰。

sentences.english: How can it be considered a viral hit?
sentences.chinese: 它怎么可能被认为是病毒性视频？

sentences.english: It is used to treat viral infection and autoimmunity diseases.
sentences.chinese: 用于治疗病毒性感染和自身免疫性疾病等。
